body_html:
Don't know how you're feeling about this, but it would be nice to merge my branch with ZFloat and ZDouble types at some point. I have implemented fft, fft2, fft3, fftn, ifft, ifft2, ifft3, ifftn and fftshift, ifftshift already there.

It would require some testing effort though as I have not written unit tests, but am actively using all the functions.

https://github.com/PhilippPelz/pytorch

I will merge the upstream again when 0.3 comes out.

It would require some testing effort though as I have not written unit tests, but am actively using all the functions.
https://github.com/PhilippPelz/pytorch
I will merge the upstream again when 0.3 comes out.
body:
Don't know how you're feeling about this, but it would be nice to merge my branch with ZFloat and ZDouble types at some point. I have implemented fft, fft2, fft3, fftn, ifft, ifft2, ifft3, ifftn and fftshift, ifftshift already there. 

It would require some testing effort though as I have not written unit tests, but am actively using all the functions. 

https://github.com/PhilippPelz/pytorch


I will merge the upstream again when 0.3 comes out.
